directions: Heat the olive oil on a large skillet over medium heat. Stir in the garlic and cook until tender and aromatic, about 2 minutes. Add the Swiss chard and balsamic vinegar; cook and stir until the chard is wilted and tender, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 1 bunch Swiss chard, stalks discarded, leaves cut into wide ribbons
title: Simple Swiss Chard
